Database

Class DatabaseAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • Database.DatabaseAccess

  • public class DatabaseAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to access the central database of the application to add, set, and get the various data points within the database, to be able to access the data through out the rest of the classes. This is used through the public data retrieval methods included.
    Since:
    2/19/2021
